definition: fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing

sentences.english: I watched a movie called "Diary of a Wimpy Kid".
sentences.chinese: 我看了一部名叫“小屁孩日记”的电影。

sentences.english: These little brats have gone too far these days.
sentences.chinese: 这些小屁孩越来越过分了。

sentences.english: Rodrick Rules is the second book in the Diary of a Wimpy Kid series.
sentences.chinese: 罗德里格克法则是小屁孩日记系列的第二部。

sentences.english: At that time I was a little kid and I knew nothing.
sentences.chinese: 那时俺就一小屁孩，啥都不懂。

sentences.english: How did that little yutz get a girl on his own?
sentences.chinese: 那小屁孩自己是怎么吊上马子的？

sentences.english: None of this crap these kids are playing.
sentences.chinese: 这些小屁孩都在浪费青春。

sentences.english: He sounds like a repulsive young man.
sentences.chinese: 他听起来就是一个让人厌恶的小屁孩。

sentences.english: You sound like a whiny brat.
sentences.chinese: 你就像一个满腹牢骚的小屁孩。

sentences.english: Then again there are far too many disrespectful brats here in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美国有太多不尊重人的小屁孩。

sentences.english: You cry again for the tenth time to see the Diary of a wimpy kid.
sentences.chinese: 这已经是你看小屁孩日记第十遍了，居然又哭了。

definition: smell of mother's milk not yet dried (idiom); immature and inexperienced/still wet behind the ears
erhua variant of 小孩[xiao3 hai2]
mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
queer uncle, referring to a young to middle-aged male pedophile (Internet slang)
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
